title: Amazon Essentials T-Shirts for Men, 100% Cotton and Cotton-Poly Blend, Regular-Fit, Short-Sleeve Crewneck, 2-Pack
description: REGULAR FIT: These men's cotton t-shirts are designed for optimal comfort through shoulders, chest, and waist
SOFT COMFORT: Crafted from lightweight jersey fabric, our t-shirts for men offer a soft touch
CLASSIC DESIGN: Both our 100% cotton and cotton-poly options feature a pull-on crew neckline and short sleeves. Solids are 100% cotton and heathers are a cotton-poly blend.
DURABLE DETAILS: These essentials shirts include ribbed neck trim, a tagless printed label, and double-needle stitching to enhance comfort and durability
CONSISTENT SIZING: Discover your fit easily with our men's t-shirts multipack

The Amazon Essentials Men's T-Shirt Pack offers both a Solid and Heathers option. This pack of men’s cotton tees is crafted from a premium blend that offers a lightweight feel and lasting durability. With a regular fit through the shoulders, chest, and waist, these plain t-shirts are an essential addition to your wardrobe. This clothing for men are designed with durability and style, featuring a classic crew neckline, short sleeves, and a tagless label
